title.subtitle: Python Programming for Hackers and Reverse Engineers
title.description: "Gray Hat Python," the first Python book written for advanced security analysts, explains the intricacies of using Python to assist in a range of security analysis tasks.
title.title_long: Gray Hat Python: Python Programming For Hackers And Reverse Engineers
title.synopsys: Setting Up Your Development Environment -- Debuggers And Debugger Design -- Building A Windows Debugger -- Pydbg : A Pure Python Windows Debugger -- Immunity Debugger : The Best Of Both Worlds -- Hooking -- Dll And Code Injection -- Fuzzing -- Sulley -- Fuzzing Windows Drivers -- Dapython---scripting Ida Pro -- Pyemu---the Scriptable Emulator. By Justin Seitz. Includes Bibliographical References And Index.
title.title: Gray Hat Python: Python Programming For Hackers And Reverse Engineers
